sentence.Network_en: Namibian law permits ranchers to shoot cheetahs to protect their livestock.
sentence.Network_cn: 纳米比亚法律允许农场主射杀猎豹以保护家畜。

sentence.Network_en: The new Namibian flag was hoisted up the flagpole.
sentence.Network_cn: 纳米比亚的新国旗升到了旗杆顶上。

sentence.Network_en: Namibian police are to give an update of their investigation to the media Monday.
sentence.Network_cn: 星期一纳米比亚警察将向媒介公开最新的调查结果.

PerfectNetExp.abs: namibe 波部, namibian 纳米比亚的, namibe 纳米贝

list.abs: on weekends it trundles between the namibian capital and the old german colonial seaside resort of swakopmund , stopping along the way for game drives , dune excursions and lion-feeding .它在周末往来于纳米比亚首都和古老的德国殖民小镇加海滨度假胜地斯瓦科普蒙德，沿途为去野外驾驶，沙丘远足和喂饲狮子的游客停站。

means.word_mean: 1. a native or inhabitant of Namibia
1. of or relating to Namibia or its people
